aymansadiq.name: Ayman Sadiq
aymansadiq.description: Ayman Sadiq is a Bangladeshi entrepreneur, educator, and author. He is the founder and CEO of 10 Minute School, an online educational platform in Bangladesh. He is also the founder and CEO of Preneur Lab, a youth-based organization in Bangladesh. He is the author of 10 Minute School's Career Guideline book. He is also a motivational speaker and has given speeches in various universities and events in Bangladesh.

Dream.title: Part 1 - Challenging your COMFORT ZONE | The power of ASKING | Ayman Sadiq
Dream.url: Challenging your COMFORT ZONE _ The power of ASKING _ Ayman Sadiq.mp4
Dream.description: In this video, Ayman Sadiq talks about the importance of challenging your comfort zone and the power of asking. He also shares his personal experience of how he challenged his comfort zone and how it helped him to grow as a person.

Dream.title: Part 2 - DO IT RIGHT NOW to get rid of your FEAR OF FAILURE | Ayman Sadiq
Dream.url: DO IT RIGHT NOW to get rid of your FEAR OF FAILURE _ Ayman Sadiq.mp4
Dream.description: In this video, Ayman Sadiq talks about the importance of doing things right now to get rid of your fear of failure. He also shares his personal experience of how he overcame his fear of failure.
